name: test_name
action_type: main action/maneuver/move action/triggered action/free maneuver/free triggered action
trigger_text: If the action is a triggered action or free triggered action, this field contains the trigger condition.
distance: Melee/Ranged/Melee or Ranged/Self, Aura/Burst/Cube/Line/Wall + *integer value or text*
special_effect: *This field is filled when the ability has a special effect that costs resources or needs some conditions to be met.*
